name: Grilled Ribeye Steak
description: A juicy 12 oz. ribeye steak, perfectly seasoned and seared to perfection on the grill. Served with your choice of two sides.

name: Bacon-Wrapped Filet Mignon
description: A 6 oz. filet mignon wrapped in savory bacon, grilled to your liking and topped with garlic butter. Served with mashed potatoes and steamed veggies.

name: Slow-Cooked BBQ Ribs
description: Fall-off-the-bone tender pork ribs, coated in our signature BBQ sauce and slow-cooked to perfection. Served with mac and cheese and coleslaw.

name: Beef Bulgogi
description: Thinly sliced beef marinated in a sweet and savory sauce, grilled to perfection and served over a bed of rice. Topped with green onions and sesame seeds.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: Breaded chicken breast smothered in marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese. Served with a side of spaghetti and garlic bread.

name: Lamb Chops
description: Juicy lamb chops seasoned with rosemary and garlic, grilled to perfection and served with a side of roasted potatoes and saut√©ed green beans.

name: Pork Belly Tacos
description: Tender pork belly cooked to crispy perfection, topped with pickled onions, cilantro, and avocado. Served on warm corn tortillas with a side of salsa and lime wedges.

name: Beef Brisket
description: Slow-smoked beef brisket, rubbed with our signature blend of spices and served with a side of baked beans and cornbread.
